She arranged the room layout for the anniversary, took us to the room after check-in, arranged red wine thoughtfully, and sent it to the barbecue place. Although there were some minor incidents when picking up the cake in the evening, Luna and the duty manager were able to solve the problem quickly. That night, the cleaning staff was also arranged to help lay the sofa bed. The next day, they thoughtfully helped us extend the check-out time to 2 o'clock, so that we had time to soak in the hot spring again after exercise.
Every link of the whole process was arranged clearly, and Luna will have to arrange it next time.
We came once in June 22, and I was particularly impressed by the hotel's hardware at that time, but this time the housekeeper's service refreshed my impression.
A great experience, I will come again next time.

msg:This time I upgraded to a private bath room! I saw many posts saying that it is not necessary to book a private bath, but I think it is much better than an ordinary room! If you arrive late at night, you can soak in the room directly after dinner. There are more people in the pool on the mountain at night! You can tell the front desk in advance that the private bath in the room is disinfected, and an aunt will come to disinfect it in person, which is very reassuring. The mountain is very quiet at night. Play some music, eat some fruits, drink some wine, soak in the private bath, look at the hillside, and enjoy the unique time. It's very comfortable! ! ! 
I think the hotel service is ok. There will be a butler to add WeChat in advance. Special thanks to Luna for taking care of it, 24 hours on call! It may not be the peak season, and it is also recommended that everyone travel off-peak, and the experience will be much better. The room will prepare children's things in advance. This time I found two cute bunny towels and handwritten cards, which is very considerate! 
The key is that I think the food is OK! The Chinese restaurant for dinner, the Sichuan cuisine is excellent, a little expensive but delicious üòã The whole family is very satisfied with the casserole tofu! To be honest, the breakfast buffet is the best I've ever had!
After eating, I strolled up the mountain to soak in the hot springs. There were surprisingly few people on Saturday morning. It is recommended to take a hot spring bath in the morning, which is better than in the evening! Many pools were empty, and I went to enjoy a big private hot spring again. After soaking, I sat next to it and drank two cups of free brown sugar ginger tea. Occasionally, there was a gentle spring breeze, which was comfortable!
There is also a children's playground and a sports field, and you can climb the mountain! I didn't have time to experience it, I will come again next time!
Eat well, stay well, soak well, release stress, and naturally relax. It's a good place to relax and relieve stress!
Pay attention to the group room voucher at any time. I think it's expensive but worth it!

Environment: The hotel is elegant as a whole, the interior design is simple and a**ospheric, spacious and bright, and a one-and-a-half-year-old child can also stride forward with confidence. Facilities: The children's playground facilities are very safe and the venue is spacious. I hope the air conditioning in the playground can be controlled at around 24 degrees. The air conditioning in the May Day playground is 21-22 degrees, which is a little cold. Children are excited to play and sweat and are prone to catching cold. The mid-mountain hot spring pool can be integrated into the embrace of nature and has privacy. Each hot spring pool is also thoughtfully equipped with sofa chairs, bath towels, and towels. There is no need to say much about the hotel's hardware facilities. The hotel started with a high-end business positioning group, but it transformed to the parent-child group with the highest market demand in time. name:M‚Äça‚Äçg‚Äçg‚Äçi‚Äçe‚Äç5‚Äç2‚ÄçÔøΩ‚ÄçÔøΩ
info:Stayed in May 2024

rating:5
posted:Posted May 2, 2024
msg:For the May Day trip, I chose the Bay Half Mountain Hot Spring Resort Hotel in Miyun, Beijing. I had a lot of fun with my children~
Facilities: Five-star facilities, every detail is very good, the environment is high and elegant, the hotel prepared various DIYs for our mothers who took their children out for a walk, and the children were very happy~
Hygiene: There is no need to exaggerate the hygiene~
Environment: The hotel has hot springs, halfway up the mountain, with a total of more than a dozen hot spring pools, with a beautiful environment. While taking a bath, you can enjoy the beautiful scenery deep in the mountains~ After breakfast the next day, I chose to climb the mountain and climb to the top of the mountain to see the panoramic view of Miyun, which is particularly stress-relieving~
Service: What I want to say most is the service. I have been to the Seven-Star Burj Al Arab Hotel in Dubai. I think the most expensive thing is not the hotel environment, but the service. I also have a room butler for Free Dubai. The Half Mountain Hotel also has a room butler. My butler is Xiao Cheng. The service is particularly good, the arrangements are well-organized, and he responds to every request. He is very warm. I have recommended it to my friends and asked them to find Xiao Cheng to bring their children~

If I had to make a request, it would be that there could be more breakfast styles. I felt that there were not enough varieties. In my personal opinion, it was actually very good.

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Deluxe Garden-view Double Room
info:Stayed in April 2024
info:Family
info:1 Review
rating:4.5
posted:Posted April 5, 2024
msg:Take the high-speed rail from Beijing Chaoyang Station to Miyun Station, and get off the high-speed rail and take a taxi in half an hour. It is close to Yunfoshan Ski Resort. Overall, the hotel service staff are very enthusiastic. The best impression is the restaurant and room service staff. The hotel facilities are complete, there is a children's club, you can swim, take a hot spring bath, exercise, play ball, and the breakfast is very rich. But there are also areas that need improvement: 
1. Because it is a holiday, there is a long queue of cars waiting to register at the hotel gate. The driver was unwilling to wait, so I took the child to get off the car at the gate and asked the hotel registration staff at the gate if it was far to the lobby. They said it was quite far and they would call the hotel shuttle to pick us up. After thanking them, I waited next to the hotel exit. During this time, many guests who drove complained that registration was too troublesome, resulting in a long queue at the gate. As a result, the registration staff probably forgot to call the shuttle to pick up because they were too busy. Seeing that the cars were getting more and more, I had to go over and ask the registration staff when the shuttle would come. The other party used the intercom to ask the shuttle to pick us up, and did not apologize to me. Fortunately, the shuttle bus driver was very enthusiastic and hurried to help with the luggage. When my daughter insisted on sitting in the last row, the driver stopped the car and put the child in the last row.
2. All service items in the hotel need to be booked, and the experience is very poor. The hotel's starting point may be diversion, fearing that there will be too many people during the festival and causing a bad experience. In my opinion, this is completely from the hotel's standpoint. This is very unfriendly to the elderly who cannot use mobile phones, and it also adds an extra burden to the guests. Wanting to play but not being able to make an appoin**ent will make the guests experience very bad. In fact, you only need to tell the guests the opening hours. If there is no place or there are too many people, the guests will naturally choose to go at other times, rather than the bad experience of not being able to play without an appoin**ent. The child wanted to play badminton, but we didn't make an appoin**ent that day, so we made an appoin**ent for basketball üèÄ. When we arrived at the scene, even if there were vacancies on the badminton court, we were told that we couldn't play without an appoin**ent. Fortunately, we made an appoin**ent for basketball and were allowed to play. The next morning, the child wanted to play badminton, but didn't want to make an appoin**ent for the next day. After going there, he said that he didn't make an appoin**ent. I checked and found that the appoin**ent was wrong, but the appoin**ent was full that day, so he was still not allowed to play.
3. Children in the children's club must register their room number and child information. I didn't understand the original intention of the hotel to require registration. Is it to give the staff something to do? In fact, the people who go to play are all guests of the hotel. In fact, the staff only need to pay attention to the safety of the children and answer the guests' inquiries from time to time. There is no need to register at all.
4. It may be that there are many people on holidays, the dinner takes a long time to serve, and there are not many dishes to choose from. You need to queue for breakfast. Although the dishes are rich, the long waiting time will reduce the experience.

Finally, the overall feeling is that there is still a certain psychological gap between the service experience and the room price.

msg:To be honest, I haven't stayed in such a comfortable hotel in the suburbs for a long time. First of all, the hardware facilities are good, the rooms are clean and tidy, the hot springs are very unique, and the sports venues and fitness equipment are complete. in addition. The humanistic service is very thoughtful. The hotel staff are proactive and can solve any questions at any time. They are considerate and enthusiastic.
The most noteworthy thing is that there is a dedicated person to guide you in the breakfast room, which many five-star hotels cannot do. For in-store entertainment reservations, we can go according to our own schedule, which not only controls the flow of people, but also makes the play experience high.
The butler-style service allows us to communicate with the hotel at any time. This time the butler is Alice, who is warm and attentive from beginning to end, making us feel at home.
All in all, our family of three was very satisfied with this stay. If we prepare a bottle of clothing deodorizing spray in the room, it would really be comparable to the hotel service in Japan! Highly recommended!

msg:The hotel is in Miyun, a bit far from the city. Helen, the housekeeper, contacted us in advance and informed us of the hotel's entertainment options. I arrived at the hotel at around 6pm, and there was no space in the underground garage. I could only park in Parking Lot 2, which is a 5-minute walk from the lobby. Helen was already waiting for us in the lobby, guided us to check in, sent us to the room, introduced the room facilities, and when she saw there were children, she took the initiative to contact the staff to help us put together beds. The child had a birthday during the trip, and the hotel sent greeting cards and cakes. The rooms are in the south wing of the hotel, with hot springs, swimming, fitness, badminton, skating, and alumite salt steaming. The restaurant is in the south wing and you need to go through the front desk. The hot spring has a large indoor pool that can accommodate more than a dozen people. You can ask the staff for the locker key to put your clothes. There are more than a dozen small pools, which are semi-open and can accommodate 5-6 people. They have independent changing rooms. Clothes can only be placed in the rest area. The small sun in some small pools was broken and was not repaired in time. There are free brown sugar water and sour plum soup near the hot spring pool, and the staff will send bathrobes and towels to the hot spring pool. The swimming pool is indoors, allowing swimming and water massage. The locker room has a sauna and dryer. There is a gym where you can play irons and there is also a chess and card room. Badminton and skating are in another area, badminton is 15/piece, others are free. The Western restaurant is in the lobby. Breakfast is 198 per person, which is normal for a five-star hotel. The fruits and desserts are delicious. The Chinese restaurant is on the 3rd floor and is a bit expensive. The distance to eat nearby is 4 kilometers away, and takeaway is available. The overall feeling of the hotel is very comfortable, and the staff are warm and hospitable, especially the housekeeper Helen.

posted:Posted September 27, 2023
msg:My family has recommended it many times before. If you want to take a hot spring bath when the weather gets cold, come here and give it a try. The surrounding environment of the hotel is quite good, the weather in Miyun is relatively blue, and it is very comfortable to stay among the green water and green mountains. The hotel is relatively clean overall, and the service is OK. The butler at the reception is Amy. She called me before I went but I didn't receive it. She is very nice and attentive. She will remind you in time on every aspect and provide a lot of help and services. Most of the other service staff in the hotel will smile and say hello when they see the guests, but not all. The delivery of things to the guest room was on time, which was good. As for the hot springs, the service staff are very enthusiastic and have a good service attitude. Except for the housekeeper, the service attitude in the hot spring area is the best. However, the hotel does not have enough control over the hot springs. There will be guests, especially those with children, eating fruits and biscuits in the hot spring pool. There are fewer pools, but there are more guests. The experience depends on luck and whether it is a weekend. I only ate at the Chinese restaurant for hotel meals. It didn‚Äôt taste bad and the ingredients were pretty good. The price was a bit expensive, but most hotels at the same price have this price, so it‚Äôs considered normal. Breakfast is quite satisfactory, the stewed wontons are okay, the dough is chewy and not shabby, and the vegetables, salads and fruits are relatively fresh. The breakfast environment is almost as noisy as the dinner environment. If you want to have breakfast quietly, don't even think about it. It's a domestic environment. I experienced sound therapy. The room was next to a child's craft house and the sound insulation was not good. The whole process was filled with the sounds of children shouting and adults chatting. Sound therapy is basically a completely silent environment, but the location of the room was not good enough to create an unpleasant experience. generally. In the end, Amy helped us with late check-out and gave me a cake. The service was highly rated. But the overall experience is average, and the main hot springs are not very good. Guangtu Hotel is definitely not here. So I don‚Äôt have many thoughts about coming back.

msg:The room is neat and clean, and is thoughtfully equipped with children's bathrobes, slippers, etc., which is more suitable for family accommodation. Outside Shadian, it is surrounded by mountains, shaded by green trees, gurgling water, and has a pleasant scenery. When it rains, waterfalls cascade down the cliffs and splash in the streams at the foot of the mountains; when the weather is fine, tourists go for an outing and travel through the forest trails. The large balcony in the room is even more unique. It is very comfortable to sit on the bamboo chairs on the balcony, enjoy the cool breeze, look at the mountain view, eat fruits and drink drinks. The hot spring is located on the top of the mountain. The pools are arranged according to the twelve zodiac animals. They are semi-open and can be enjoyed while enjoying the view and bathing. The hotel housekeeper Xiao Han was even more enthusiastic and cheerful, which made us quickly understand the hotel's service items and promptly solved some of our individual needs, making us truly feel at home!

A large number of people arrived and successfully avoided the peak, which improved the experience of the entire stay. The second biggest advantage of the hotel is the provision of morning and afternoon tea. You don‚Äôt need to get up early, and you can successfully avoid the peak meal times; the third advantage is that although the price is a little expensive, the mini bar in the room is free, bottled water is provided unlimited, and the reserved private soup room does not limit the amount of water. There is no hidden consumption at all, which is what I personally prefer; the fourth is soft power, the service staff of the hotel are very enthusiastic, patient, and respond quickly;
After talking about the advantages, let's talk about the disadvantages:
1. There are too many mosquitoes, and the whole family is not spared;
2. The hotel is built on the mountainside, and the height difference caused the floors of the north and south buildings to be a bit confusing. It was really confusing for the first time;
3. The hotel did not have a charging pile for the tram that I drove this trip. This suggestion should be improved, after all, new energy is becoming more and more popular;

Then parent-child activities include a children's playground and a swimming pool. The children's playground is clean and well-equipped, with a large slide and a large ocean ball area, and the rest is a scattered handicraft area; the swimming pool has 2 small children's pools and 1 large swimming pool. The last thing I experienced was the Banshan Hot Spring. There are staff on each floor to provide assistance actively. There are multiple medicine pools. The higher the location, the more people there are. It is a good experience for the whole family to soak together. For meals, there are Western food and Chinese food. The beef noodles in Western food are strongly recommended. The breakfast is a Chinese and Western buffet. The overall parent-child experience is very good, especially when children leave.

posted:Posted March 19, 2023
msg:Before I checked in, the butler contacted me and added WeChat. Since I went there for the first time, I had a lot of questions. She answered them one by one and sent me the hotel menu. The service of the exclusive butler is very good. I was taken aback when I checked in. There were 4 counters open and many people checked in at 3 o'clock. We happened to arrive at the hotel at that time. It was also the first time I saw the counter in the corner, and the service was very good. The first impression was that it was good except for being chaotic. The butler took us to the room and introduced it. Because we were going to climb the mountain, we put down our things and went out. She thoughtfully prepared water for us to quench our thirst when we went down the mountain. The mountain is just behind the hotel, it is very close, and it is easy to climb up. The scenery is very good, which is a plus point for the hotel. According to the introduction, this hotel was used in 2017. The last time I went to Yanqi Hotel was 14 years ago, but I think that hotel has better furnishings. The bed and pillows of this hotel are okay, but the sanitation makes me not very satisfied. The ground at the entrance feels like there is a layer of soil, and the bathtub is a bit unclear. We have a soup pool alone, and it is very good to clean in front of the guests. I suggest that the hotel sell disposable brush heads and brush holders for guests to choose, or you can choose shared ones for free, or it is better to use one-off brush heads. Bathing is very comfortable and relieves the fatigue of the day. I chose a Chinese restaurant for both dinner and breakfast. The dinner was mediocre. The Geleshan spicy chicken I ordered had no taste. It was all boiled asparagus soup and I ate half a bowl of rice. My husband‚Äôs half fish head pancake he said was not next to the Miyun Reservoir. The restaurant is so fresh, but it's ok. The morning tea was opened for breakfast because there were too many people. This is very good, and there are many varieties to choose from. Although the edges of the pot stickers are a bit dry and hard due to heat preservation, they are still delicious. Even better if you can't eat pork. I want to go again in autumn, hoping to improve. By the way, I heard some guests say that the hotel is like a maze. Fortunately, I know the way.

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Stayed in March 2023
info:Couples
info:5 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted March 13, 2023
msg:The online celebrity shop has been booked long in advance. The appoin**ent is from Sunday to Monday. I feel that there will be fewer people. The price must be a bit good to enjoy. The housekeeper Ada contacted me one day in advance, added WeChat, and informed me of the project details and QR codes that need to be reserved. I asked in advance at noon that day, and I checked in at one o'clock. Ada was waiting at the front desk, and then took me all the way to the room, and introduced the locations of various venues along the way. The room is relatively spacious. The shower room, toilet and bathtub are all separated. My favorite is the smart toilet seat, which won't get cold in winter. The bath products are all from L'Occitane, even the small soap for washing hands. The eight kinds of beverages and small biscuits in the refrigerator are free, as well as hanging ear coffee and tea bags. There are many kinds of pillows, you can choose what you like. One room can bring 1, 2, or 3 children to live together. As long as they can stay, they are free. This is very good, but breakfast has to be paid. After resting in the room for a while, we made an appoin**ent for the half-life soup pool at 4-6 o‚Äôclock. We directly changed into swimsuits and bathrobes and went there. We went out from the door next to the lobby and took the elevator up the mountain. There were 12 small pools arranged in random order according to the twelve zodiac signs. Fortunately, there were no people. Too many, we started looking for either very hot or someone, and finally found an empty pool with moderate water temperature in the last room, which is still my pig zodiac sign. There are hot brown sugar ginger water and sour plum soup along the road. Bath towels can also be changed by the staff at any time. We also caught up with the temperature measurement to ensure that the temperature will not be too low. The scenery outside the hot spring is beautiful, and it is also the biggest highlight of the hotel. Unfortunately, the weather was not very good that day, and there were no leaves and flowers in early spring. Salt steaming should be done after the hot spring is over, and an appoin**ent with the housekeeper is required. Men and women are separated, and only four men and four women can be received per hour. The person who received me was Meizi, who was very enthusiastic. He introduced the precautions in detail on the way to lead us in, poured hot mangosteen water for me in time, folded a small cap with a towel for me, and took pictures for me, very kind. I went to the gym to have a look. The room is reserved, water and towels are available, and the rowing machine is very good. By the way, there was a muddy rain the night before we went, and the staff Liu Guochun and Chen Xuqiang helped us clean the car, which was a pleasant surprise. Mineral water and hot water in the building can be found almost everywhere, so you don‚Äôt need to take water from the house to go to various venues. If you go to the children's playground from the lobby on the first floor, you will find that the first floor has suddenly changed to the fifth floor in a certain elevator. If you go down to the children's playground, many people will faint here. Before leaving, he would ask us about our experience satisfaction, and we can feel the seriousness and sincerity of all the staff.

Remember to wear the padded vest in the closet when you go to the hot springs. You need to walk in the open air for a while. There is an indoor big hot spring (the bottom is Mercury, which is also the end of the hiking trail). The semi-outdoor small soup designed by Zodiac, the environment is very private! No one can open the door to enter at will. We chose "rabbit soup" (in order to meet the scene, it is actually a ginger soup pond), the water temperature is 40 degrees, and you can enjoy the mountain view while soaking, so comfortable! Each small soup house has its own bathroom, and there is no need to go out to find it. Our family of three contracted a fast-falling here for an afternoon, which is no different from "private soup", hahaha! And the point is, the soup pool is unlimited! !
The official account can reserve various hotel facilities at any time. Each room has one hour of leisure time on the playground. Basketball, table tennis, and badminton can be selected from three options. Going to play ball üè∏Ô∏è, I will enjoy aromatherapy alone, an hour of relaxing experience, very freeing (sorry to my technician here, I forgot your nameü•π...Thank you very much).
Dinner is a Western-style light meal, and the Sea, Land and Air Super Burger is really delicious! The children's pasta is full of aroma when served, and the fruit on the fruit plate must be said to be really high quality! We have stayed in many star hotels, and we are also engaged in related industries. To be honest, the catering in the bay is really amazing! Speaking of which, let's just mention the breakfast buffet, it's very rich! The quality of the dishes is very high, and the croissants are all freshly baked, and the craftsmanship is very wonderful (I usually bake as a hobby, so I can tell the depth of it with one bite üòç)! The pancakes don't have to wait long, the taste is very üâëÔ∏è, the sushi is freshly made, there are several kinds, not just small rolls that fool things. On the day of check-out, we experienced the swimming pool and hiking trails. The swimming pool is not big, and the water temperature is really not high, but it is certain that it meets the standard. There are also two children's pools, which are very clean, and the lifeguards are always online. The back mountain is named after the stars, and it is not difficult to climb. It feels very fulfilling to walk around before leaving the hotel.

The manager on duty at the playground immediately called the butler. Ada and the male assistant manager in the lobby (sorry, I forgot to ask for my nameüò≠) took it quickly Disinfection supplies came to deal with it, and ice cream was sent twice to appease. msg:Room facilities:
The facilities are complete, WIFI direct connection is very convenient, there are bathtubs and shower cubicles, and they are relatively spacious, but the bath liquid is an empty bottle, and it is estimated that there are many people in the winter vacation, so I forgot to change it. But the service was good, it was delivered quickly and refills were added.

Dining room:
We ordered the pampering parents package, with dinner for two, cold vegetables, sauced meat and pumpkin are delicious. The main course is sea bass and tomato beef brisket. The beef brisket is relatively soft but the taste is quite satisfactory. The example soup is chicken soup, but the taste is average.

breakfast:
I forgot to take pictures, there are both Chinese and Western breakfasts, which are very rich. It is worth mentioning that the fruit quality is very good and fresh.

Leisure facilities:
The mid-mountain hot spring is worth experiencing, the water temperature is very comfortable, and the scenery is good, but there are more people on weekends. I originally wanted to watch the sunset, but there are too many people and it is not easy to take pictures.
I went to experience the physical therapy at night, and Miss Zhang's technique is very good. Although I only experienced it for half an hour, I entered a half-dream and half-awake state in just a few minutes, and I was very relaxed.

The hotel also has a hiking trail, which is closed when it gets dark. We went there early in the morning, and it takes about an hour to stop and go around the circle. It would be better if it is a season of warm spring and flowers blooming or a season of high and crisp autumn. In winter, we can only look forward to encountering sunny and sunny days.

Service: The hotel's service is very considerate. If you are an old user, you will also have an exclusive butler service. This is our first experience, and we were lucky enough to be assigned a dedicated butler. Helen is very professional, reminding every detail in place, and responding to messages in the middle of the night in seconds.
In addition, I would like to praise Chen Xiaoyun and Cao Yanlin from the guest room depar**ent. One went to the restaurant to borrow chopsticks for us at night; the other was eager to help prepare plastic bags and mineral water.

This experience is very happy, and I am generally satisfied, but because it is winter vacation + weekend, the price is really not cheap, I hope to have the opportunity to go again

There are too many people for breakfast, but it may be because there are too many people during the Chinese New Year, which is understandable.

Finally, I would like to thank Ms. Kelly Sun (Â≠ôÊòéÂçé), who is gentle and enthusiastic, for her dedicated service and answering questions from check-in to departure. She is really very professional! The hotel has such excellent staff, it should add chicken legs~

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Stayed in January 2023
info:Family
info:7 Reviews
rating:3
posted:Posted January 28, 2023
msg:I booked the Little Yellow Duck parent-child room for two nights with my family. The price is also high during the Spring Festival peak season. Let‚Äôs make an overall evaluation by item:
It's more than two o'clock in the afternoon as soon as you enter the door, and you can check in after three o'clock. During the peak season, you can't check in early, which is understandable and reasonable. And before three o'clock, the front desk call and the housekeeper's WeChat will notify you that you can check in early, which is very thoughtful.
The concierge has grapefruit juice and scented tea to welcome guests. Perhaps out of environmental protection considerations, there are no disposable cups, they are all small teacups, and you need to consciously put them on the plate next to them when they are used up. This is really worrying, some customers will turn it back to the clean cup area after using it. Isn't it necessary to use water to clean the cups, which is not environmentally friendly?
Entering the room is a little yellow duck parent-child room with only one room on each floor. There is a sign on the door of the room, which means it is a room cooperated by Ctrip. After entering, it is actually a connecting room with a double bed room and a twin bed room. Seeing this layout, I thought about the many comments I read before, and I don‚Äôt remember any reviews mentioning that the little yellow duck room is this kind of connecting room . So if you know in advance that this is the form, it is better to book two rooms separately, the price will be relatively cheaper. It would be great if there were instructions to inform consumers before!
The children's club on the first floor did not feel as entertaining as it was advertised after the experience. First of all, the brightness of the lights used in the overall space is not high, which makes people feel not happy enough after entering. There are not many types of entertainment facilities, and the colors are very monotonous. Perhaps it is compared to the children's playgrounds of other parent-child hotels. It is good for children to play, and adults may make comparisons.
There are almost no elevator lights in the hotel. I don't know if it is for energy saving. In short, it feels depressing and does not match the hotel's positioning.
The breakfast buffet has a rich variety, but the emergency plan is very insufficient to cope with the reception capacity of the peak season passenger flow. As a result, it is close to 11 o'clock and the breakfast is still queuing up. The deadline for picking up meals is also at 11 o'clock, but there is no corresponding delay arrangement, so that the guests who line up later have no more time to eat. At the last closing time, when there were still many tables of diners eating, the lights in the restaurant were turned off one after another, and the waiters frantically cleaned up the tables and plates. There was a feeling of being urged, and the experience was very uncomfortable.
Regarding parking, I went out for dinner the first night, and when I came back, there were three parking spaces next to the hotel entrance, two of which were occupied, and the remaining one was told that parking was not allowed, but refused to let us park on the grounds of the fire exit. Then, if it is a fire exit, are the two cars next to it illegally occupied? Is it possible to report them? Or is this parking space reserved for hotel leaders? Or is our car not good enough to park here? unknown.
This experience was not particularly uncomfortable, because after all, it is understandable that the hotel is busy during the peak season, so the expectations are not particularly high. But the hotel is indeed not as high as it is advertised. Among all the parent-child hotels we have stayed in, none of them stand out in any aspect, so the hotel's passenger flow should be thanks to the hotel's corporate promotion.
Finally, I would like to thank the housekeeper Ada for her service. She does not rest during the Spring Festival holiday, which is very hard and not easy. But should the hotel have performance needs? The housekeepers of other hotels will not ask for nominations and praises in the comments. It is not easy for everyone, thank you very much.

name:L‚Äçi‚Äçl‚Äçi‚Äçd‚Äçe‚Äçl‚Äçv‚Äçp‚Äça‚Äçi‚Äçs‚Äçh‚Äçi‚Äçk‚Äçe
info:Stayed in January 2023
info:Family
info:10 Reviews
rating:4.5
posted:Posted January 26, 2023
msg:As an online celebrity hotel in Beijing, there are a lot of tourists who come on vacation during the Spring Festival, and it seems that all services are a bit stretched. The rooms basically have to wait until after three in the afternoon. Hotel services such as meals, health massage, etc. need to be booked in advance, otherwise there is a queue The waiting time is very long, and the waiting time is also a test of patience. It takes more than 20 minutes before a dish is served!
It can only be said that the hotel's reputation is greater than its service when it comes to the holidays!
During the two-day Spring Festival holiday, the weather is very cold, and climbing the mountain is a test of physical strength! It takes an hour and a half to complete the climb. Although there are not many people, the scenery is also very ordinary. Maybe there are not many scenery to see in Beijing in winter, and there are bare places everywhere!
The hot springs are also overcrowded, too prominent for parents and children. It feels like a children's playground. There are families soaking in the pools everywhere. Although there are many pools, each one is not big. Five or six people soaking in it will make the pools very crowded. In addition, some parents still leave their children's lifebuoys in the pool, which is really noisy and crowded. The temperature of the hot springs is not very high. It is too cold in Beijing in winter, so you should pay attention to keep warm when you go to the hot springs outside. It is very cold when you come out of the pool, and the wind blows directly from the middle of the mountain. When you enter the hot spring pool, you must dry yourself off immediately! Otherwise, it is easy to catch a cold, the ground of the pool is icy, and it is easy to slip and fall. The hotel should have protective measures for these details!
The room configuration is quite satisfactory, there are not many surprises! The sound insulation is not good, there are noisy children in the corridor, but the room can hear it clearly!
The overall experience is really average, I can only say that you are a tourist who is afraid of noise, so don't come here during the holidays, the experience will not be good!
There are Heilongtan, Miyun Reservoir and other scenic spots nearby. The fish in the reservoir is very fresh and tastes good!

The overall price/performance ratio of the hotel is average, and the price is really a little high compared to the service and soft and hard facilities! It is definitely not as good as Bulgari, Peninsula, Mandarin Oriental and other brand hotels in the urban area. They are used as resort hotels in the suburbs, and they are considered Internet celebrities in Beijing. They should be more famous!

Several major features of this hotel: 1) The main building is divided into the south area and the north area. It is built on the mountain, and the 5th floor of the south area is connected with the 1st floor (G floor) of the north area; it takes a little time to warm up and get familiar with the terrain. But in fact, it adds to the fun; the back mountain is named after the check-in points of the 8 planets (Pluto was eliminated), and a small hike of about 3.5 kilometers is arranged. The highest altitude is only 240 meters. There are steps and wooden planks. For children Very friendly with old people. 2) The hot spring is located outdoors, you need to wear a swimsuit + hotel bathrobe, then take the elevator and walk about 300 meters to get there; the semi-open-air soup pool named after the twelve zodiac signs can avoid hypoxia and enjoy the scenery, but the mountain wind is strong at night , the elderly in the hot springs in the evening in autumn and winter need to be cautious (it‚Äôs okay during the day); 3) All kinds of experience projects need to make an appoin**ent, and these appoin**ents have certain rules and restrictions (such as a single day, or a relative total number of people) , and very user-friendly (items can be canceled and rescheduled, rescheduled after expiration, multiple projects can be reserved at the same time, etc.), after we experience it, we feel that making a reservation is generally conducive to allowing more guests to experience More projects, so don't be afraid of trouble, there is a QR code to adjust the appoin**ent at any time. The staff of the hotel are very friendly and will take the initiative to greet with a smile; our exclusive butler Ms. Name) are very kind and friendly, the service is thoughtful and patient, and the management is very humanized, which made our New Year's trip very warm and pleasant. I would like to express my gratitude to all of you and wish you a happy new year!

During our stay, the housekeeper Xiao Han was very good. He always helped us solve problems in time, and also helped us book salt steam and restaurants in the health center. The minibar was added to us the next day, which made it feel like home.
The whole hotel is built on the mountain, the hot spring is built on the middle of the mountain, and the hot spring pools are half open, and the scenery is also very good. On the first day of our stay, we went to soak in the soup. On the first day, we chose a higher location for the soup pool. The scenery was good, but the water temperature was not high, but the children had a great time playing in the soup pool for an hour. I went to Tangchi at noon on the second day. The experience was better. The temperature was higher than the first day. It was more comfortable to soak in the soup. In particular, I would like to thank Baiqiu, Xiao Lou and Lao Zheng from Tangchi for arranging a separate soup pool for us. Basically, our family is alone. We all had a great time soaking in a soup pool. Baiqiu also brought us mineral water and reminded the children to add more water when they were soaking in the soup, which was very considerate.
The children's playground is also a surprise this time. It's really big, clean and tidy. It's everything inside. It's great! The children had so much fun at the kids club that they didn't want to go home. Thanks to Xiao Yang and Aunt Mei, they were very patient with the children and provided the children with tissues to wipe sweat and water in time.
We stayed in a garden-view king-size room, in the south building, downstairs is the children's club, which is very convenient, the high-floor view is also good, the room is cleaned very cleanly, and the service provided by the housekeeping depar**ent is also very fast and responsive.
In terms of food and beverages, the buffet breakfast is rich in food, and children like it very much. I ate at a Chinese restaurant and a western restaurant for dinner, and the restaurant service was also very good.
This stay is really a very good experience! So the staff are very friendly and attentive, and will come again next time.

All in all, a leisure hotel worth visiting~

posted:Posted July 30, 2022
msg:The second time I came to Mid-levels, I refreshed my good impression last time. Before, it was because of the hotel facilities and hot springs. This time, I had even more experience with the [Parent-Child Hotel].

Let's talk hardware first. The hotel room facilities and sanitation can reach the five-star standard, which is very important for us parents and mothers who are dragging their families, especially children who have a small schedule and may have to stay in the house for more than half of their time. If the room It's uncomfortable to imagine how regretful it will be. This is also the reason why the Internet celebrity Jinhai Lake Bibo Island was abandoned this time - no matter how beautiful the scenery is, it is also a big problem that the hotel can't keep up.

Hot spring hotel, hot spring is the highlight. I thought it would be very hot to soak in the hot springs in summer, but it was also cool in the mountains when it was raining and cloudy these two days. The hot spring is on the mountain, there are about 6-7 soup pools, and the scenery is also very unique. The only fly in the oin**ent is that it only opens at 10 am. If the swimming pool can be opened at 7 o'clock, it will be more friendly to us mothers who want to bring their babies during the day.

Speaking of swimming, it's really great to start at 7am. These two days, I took advantage of the children to sleep in the morning and took a morning swim. There were few people and it was quiet and comfortable.

Dabao's favorite children's club has a lot of space. There are climbing slide groups suitable for older children, as well as ocean balls and large soft building blocks suitable for children over 1 year old. If the number of people is small, children can also be managed. Parents who accompany their children can sit on the bar stools outside, and Bao Dad is very happy to accompany Da Bao here - to work.

Speaking of service. Service is particularly important for "parent-child hotels", and there is not much that can really be done - not to set up some children's facilities to become "parent-child", but to truly consider the guests from the heart and solve the actual needs of the guests . Here we must like our housekeeper Luna with real name, from the very first warm greetings, introducing hotel services, to actually helping us solve problems (the room coordination problem is troublesome, and thank you for the help of the lobby manager Jason), and every night Insider tips to make our three days and two nights here easy and enjoyable.

The impression of a hotel is first established by the staff we meet, and the experience everywhere in the hotel makes us feel [at home]
- Security Affairs Depar**ent Yu Zhaowei and Feng Xiangguo, clean our car
- Wang Mei in the children's club, warm service and very patient with children
- Attentive guidance from the guys at the Concierge
- The apricots in the swimming pool and the little lefties in the hot spring pool are friendly and polite

Of course, there is still room for improvement. For example, there are fewer time choices for parent-child activities, and there are also fewer places, so none of the activities can participate. I just hope that the hotel I like is getting better and better.

All in all, happy with this choice. There will be a chance to come again.

The hotel has complete facilities, including hot springs, children's playground, plank road, gymnasium, swimming and fitness, and the environment is beautiful. You can meet the entertainment needs in the hotel! The food is also good, the Chinese and Western restaurants are good, there are many options, and the breakfast is rich. Even in the summer, there are still many people. It would be better to go as early as possible for breakfast.
     Finally, a special thanks to Helen, the warm and considerate service made our journey perfect and warm, and I hope to see you next time!

msg:It has been almost three years since the last time I took a hot spring in Japan... Even going out of Beijing to take a hot spring has become a luxury, and the mid-level of the bay seems to be the only place where I can talk about comfort.
Take the elevator from the hotel to the mountain, there are 12 semi-open-air viewing soup pools and an indoor soup pool. The indoor soup pool has a changing room, towels are distributed at the entrance, and there are two drinking areas on the mountain road. The 12 soup pools are named after the 12 zodiac signs, with different "seasonings", and the water temperature is not the same. From the hotel to the elevator, and the mountain road to Tangchi, it is open-air, and if the weather is bad, it will be more affected.
The buffet breakfast is quite rich, and you have to wait for a table during peak hours. The manager, Nancy, attaches great importance to the opinions of the guests, and prepared egg custard and vegetable fruit plate for the baby at noon.
From the room service to the children's playground, the service attitude of the staff everywhere is good. Feng Xiangguo and Liu Wuchou from the security affairs depar**ent also helped wash the car.

The hotel staff are very attentive. Amy, the hotel butler, contacted us before check-in to arrange check-in and help to book activities. The coach Guo Jian of the gym is professional, enthusiastic and thoughtful. Thanks to the hard work of the hotel staff to provide us with a comfortable environment.

msg:High quality beyond expectations!
Because of my birthday, but I couldn't travel to Beijing, I chose this hotel from a thousand choices, mainly because there were basically no bad reviews on various review sites. Sure enough, this trip is well deserved.
1. First-class service: the most meticulous and thoughtful service among the hotels I have stayed at so far, including comparison with hotels in Sanya. Before check-in, there was contact with the service housekeeper. After that, the whole process was very caring, the feedback was quick and considerate, and a birthday cake was specially prepared. Thank you Amy Zhou Jiaqi! The parking lot staff also wiped the car clean, and those who parked on the ground also put on sunscreens. The guys at the hot springs are gentle and warm, in short, the service can't fault anything.
2. The hardware facilities and environment are good: everywhere is very clean, there are staff cleaning and cleaning up, almost no debris and dust can be seen, especially in the children's playground, you can sit anywhere, I am surprised how it can be kept so clean. Needless to say, the scenery on the mountainside is natural, and the pavilions in the garden are also antique and elegant.
3. Recreational items: Living for one day is really not enough to play, there are twelve hot spring pools, you can take a dip while overlooking the mountains and surrounds, there is a large pool in the swimming pool, two small warm water pools, whether you can swim or not, you can enjoy yourself. , The children's playground is very large, even larger than some special children's playgrounds, and it is very interesting. It is no problem to spend a few hours. The stadium has basketball, badminton, table tennis, and I didn't have time to experience it this time.
4. Eat: The breakfast is the standard of a five-star hotel. Other meals may be due to the epidemic. There are only two restaurants, a Chinese restaurant and a western restaurant. The price is not low, but the quality is really good and the quantity is large.

In this summer when the place is crowded with people, although the house is full, there is a rare tranquility. I didn't see the crowd, and I wondered where everyone went. All in all, will be back in the near future, hope to stay for two nights and enjoy.

name:K‚Äçe‚Äçk‚Äçe‚Äçt‚Äça‚Äçd‚Äçi‚Äçe
info:Stayed in May 2022
info:Family
info:55 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted June 1, 2022
msg:Five stars to give, thanks to sally, tina, and Xiao Yang for their excellent service... Next, let's start commenting
advantage:
1. The hotel is big enough with complete facilities, suitable for people of all ages
2. The scenery is good enough. There are rockeries, fountains, and hills that can be climbed on foot.
3. There are three swimming pools with different temperatures. The water temperature of the large swimming pool is the friendliest (warm) of all hotels in Beijing that I have been to.
4. The indoor children's playground is large enough to satisfy children of all ages
5. There are full-time porters at check-in and check-out and the efficiency is very high
6. The breakfast is rich enough, you can eat well, like beef rice and various pastries
7. The housekeeper is not only to praise, but also to solve the corresponding problems and considerate service
8. The overall taste of the food in the western restaurant is in line with the price. I like the big hamburger, curry beef rice and Kung Pao shrimp balls.
9. The top spray of the shower is large enough and the water pressure is high
10. The twin room can be made into a large bed of about three meters and the bedding is of high quality
11. The minibar is free and has various accessories

Next, let's talk about the areas that can be improved:
1. The overall reception capacity of the hotel has been improved. On the first day of check-in, there is only one western restaurant, which leads to extremely low efficiency in serving meals. However, the waiter can communicate effectively and try to solve the problem. When checking out, the front desk has already lined up for check-in.
2. As a parent-child hotel, it does not provide bed surrounds and the crib is only 90cm long
3. Some residents smoked in the room and opened the door without the corresponding staff to dissuade them. The smell of smoke in the corridor was very strong. This happened more than 3 times during the stay (in total, no more than 6 times in and out)
4. The overall sound insulation effect of the hotel is average. The sound in the corridor is easily transmitted into the house, and the noise of adjacent rooms (including the upper floor) will affect the room, so it is recommended to stay on the top floor
5. The ground of the children's playground is very slippery
6. The bathroom area is very small, and your elbows can easily hit the glass when you turn around and flush
7. The bathroom door has no damping and no vibration damping measures on the door frame. It is easy to smash the glass door when it is closed directly.
8. The sliding door of the bathroom cannot be closed tightly, and it is inconvenient for the baby to use after sleeping
9. There are too many people in Tangquan in the middle of the mountain, and there is absolutely no effect of private soup like the online picture (staying on weekdays and not on weekends), and some of the pools are under maintenance, and there are no blocking measures for non-reserved personnel. It is recommended to check in Reduce the number of appoin**ents during peak hours and arrange for corresponding personnel to guide to improve the experience
10. There is no free car wash service reviewed by others

First of all, the hardware of the hotel is very good. The interior of the room is very luxurious. There are also safes, refrigerators and bathtubs. Food and drink in the refrigerator are free. From the balcony, you can also see the snow scene of the hot spring soup house on the opposite side of the mountain, which is very beautiful!
The hotel has very rich supporting entertainment facilities. The air-filled stadium has 5 badminton courts, 1 full-court basketball court, 2 table tennis tables; there is also a small ice skating rink outside the stadium; children can go to the children's playground, but my family My son is older, and he is not interested in this anymore. He wants to climb the mountain, but because of the heavy snow, he can't make it. Finally, let's talk about the key point - hot springs, according to the zodiac, there are 12 soup houses, each with different formulas and effects. Each soup house has toilets, warm lights, seats for rest, racks for clothes, and they are all semi-open. , you can see the outside scenery. Bring a drink, soak in the hot spring for a while, and drink a cool drink is very refreshing! On the mountain road of the hot spring, no matter the snow scene during the day or the lights at night, it is also very beautiful.
For dinner at a western restaurant in the evening, the package includes steak, pasta, Hainanese chicken rice, salad, fruit, and beef soup. A family of three will definitely be full, and the taste is also very good. There are not many people in the western restaurant, there is no need to queue, and there are also Asian dishes suitable for us, curry rice, ramen and so on.
The breakfast on the second day was also very good. Although there were many people, it was very orderly under the arrangement of the on-site staff. All kinds of delicious food can be picked up at will, in addition to ready-made noodles, hot dishes, meat, beverages, porridge, tofu brain, as well as freshly made noodles and pancakes, children are also full.
Special praise to our housekeeper Nancy, who contacted me the day before departure, introduced the hotel facilities and the reservation process of various projects to me, answered many of my questions, and made me have a clear plan for the itinerary, otherwise But you will miss out on a lot of fun. After we checked in, we came to the room to introduce the facilities in the room to us. It was really warm and considerate, and the service attitude was full!
This is a very satisfying trip. It is worthy of being the No.1 in Beijing Hot Spring Hotel. The child said, I will come later! Hahaha

msg:In the wake of winter vacation, the whole family went to the bay peninsula for a hot spring trip. After Ctrip booked the hotel, on the afternoon of the day before check-in, the housekeeper Han Yu made a phone call to introduce the hotel and ask about the needs. I suggested that I hope that the room should be arranged as high floors as possible without blocking, and I made an appoin**ent for the project time I hope to experience in the next two days, and Xiao Han made the arrangements one by one.
The next afternoon, I drove to the hotel. After the car was parked in the underground garage, Xiao Han arranged for the car to be washed again. Two car wash masters, Fu Wensheng and Hu Yu, cleaned the car.
During check-in, I encountered some episodes and waited for half an hour. During this period, Xiao Han kept trying his best to coordinate, and finally got his wish to live in a room with a view on the sixth floor.
The overall size of the double room is not large, and the decoration style is slightly different from the expected luxury hotel, but all the service staff encountered during the period were smiling and responsive, which made people feel very warm, and the five-star service deserved its name.
Because the 12-year-old child is relatively old, we didn't go to the children's playground, except for the hot springs, the most common place to go is the gymnasium. There are two basketball courts and five badminton courts in the gymnasium, which are enough for guests. The service staff of the gym, Master Guo and intern Zuo Yunpeng, were also very enthusiastic and offered services such as mineral water. The children had a great time.
During the period, I ate dinner at the hotel's Chinese restaurant and western restaurant. The western restaurant tasted average, and the steak was not tender. Compared with the Chinese restaurant, the taste was better. Fish head cakes and boiled beef are recommended.
Tips: You can use the off-peak travel strategy for hot springs on weekends. 4-6 pm is the peak period. When we go to the hot springs at 12:30 noon the next day, there is no one at all, and all the pools are randomly selected. The milk pool is located at the highest point, and the landscape is also the best, which is recommended.

posted:Posted January 22, 2022
msg:January was the 9th anniversary of my husband and I getting the certificate, and just in time for my daughter‚Äôs winter vacation, I made a reservation at the Bay Half-Levels Hotel. Fortunately, it was neither affected by the epidemic nor blocked the road after the snow.
The first snow of 2022 fell in Beijing on January 20. On the morning of the check-in day, I received a phone call from the hotel's housekeeper, Luna. I kindly reminded her that if you arrive early, you can contact her to go to the hotel's entertainment facilities to play, and then check in after the time is almost up. She also sent the location of the hotel via WeChat, and reminded her that it was snowing. Slippery roads, drive carefully.
When I was about to arrive, I contacted the butler Luna again and learned that I could drive directly to the hotel lobby halfway up the mountain. When my daughter and I got off the bus, the housekeeper was already waiting in the lobby. The security led her husband down the basement. There are already staff in the basement waiting to greet you in advance, and provide a free service of washing the appearance of the vehicle for the staying guests. When my husband was unloading his luggage, a master had already come over with a bucket. The master who greeted me asked my husband if he had much luggage and whether he needed to push a luggage cart. The husband said no, so the master led the husband all the way to the lobby. The husband claims to have a strong memory, and at a glance, the masters who wash and lead the car at Gongpai seem to be called Gao Bo and Shi Fengming.
Since it was not a weekend, there were not many people in the hotel. After checking in, the butler led the way to the guest room and introduced the hotel facilities while walking.
Putting down the luggage in the guest room, the girl can't wait to play. So the housekeeper took him all the way to the children's playground. Here, soft building blocks, tree house-shaped climbing frames, three-tiered large climbing frames, ocean balls, trampolines, slides, and various recreational facilities are particularly abundant. I finally persuaded my daughter to go to the hot springs first, and then come back tomorrow, and she reluctantly left.
When we returned to the guest room to change our swimsuits, we suddenly heard the doorbell. It turned out that the hotel knew that we had reserved a room for our wedding anniversary, and gave us a cake for the anniversary. There were also swans and rose petals made of bath towels on the bed. As soon as there was a cake, the girl immediately got motivated, and after eating half of the cake, she was satisfied to go to the hot spring.
I have to say that the hotel is really big, and I walked all the way to the swimming pool and hot spring area under the guidance of the housekeeper.
The soup in the snow has a different mood. The water temperature of the soup pool is just right, and the children will not feel hot. But there are children around, I didn't dare to soak for too long. We played in the indoor swimming pool (both wading pools are more comfortable temperature) for a long time before moving to the Chinese restaurant for dinner.
Chinese restaurant, the quality is acceptable, the price is not high. The food is mediocre, nothing special.
After dinner, we walked on the snow and walked around. When it was time to make an appoin**ent, we went to the fitness center. Maybe because there are not many people on non-weekends, when we went, there was no one in the fitness center. Although the appoin**ent is badminton, table tennis, badminton, and basketball are all free to play. With the help of my daughter, I easily defeated my husband. Slightly sweating, the amount of exercise is just right...
Turning around, the buffet breakfast is rich and of good quality. I wanted to go ice skating after breakfast, but unfortunately the snow was still falling, and the hotel's outdoor ice rink was not open for safety reasons.
After looking around, the number of guests on the weekends increased significantly. I thought that the soup pool was overcrowded, so I stopped going. Coming to the children's paradise again is to follow my daughter's wish.
One morning, the girl was still unsure. Greeted Luna in advance and changed to check out at 1:00. We played until it was time for us to check out, and the daughter still did not leave, so she entrusted her to two staff members, Haijiao and Wang Mei, in the paradise. When we checked out and came back, the girl was still playing... Before leaving, the staff of the park enthusiastically gave her little toys.
In general, the Gulf Peninsula is really one of the best parent-child hotels in Beijing, and it is suitable for visiting in spring, summer, autumn and winter. Because of the snow this time, for safety reasons, I did not go climbing this time. When the weather is warm, you can take the baby to see the mountain view and climb the plank road.

name:M‚Äçe‚Äçn‚Äçg‚Äçb‚Äça‚Äçd‚Äçi‚Äçn‚Äçu‚Äço‚Äçl‚Äçi‚Äçu‚Äçr‚Äçu‚Äçs‚Äçh‚Äçi
info:Stayed in January 2022
info:Family
info:17 Reviews
rating:4.7
posted:Posted January 29, 2022
msg:During the holiday before the Spring Festival, I came to check in the Internet celebrity parent-child hotel. To sum up in one sentence, it is very suitable for parent-child and couple travel. It will be better to arrange more than 2 nights of experience.
    1. The room. The hotel is built on a mountain, the north wing is high and the south wing is low, so the floors will be strange. The first floor of the north wing is the fifth floor of the south wing, which is also the lobby of the hotel. We live in Hao double facing the mountain back, there is no scenery. If you have requirements for scenery, it is best to choose a garden view room. The toilet is separated from wet and dry, and each functional area is separated, and the toto washlet is used. Each room has a small balcony, with chairs and coffee tables on the balcony, which is very comfortable in summer. The double bed is 1.35 meters, so families with two children have no pressure. The only downside is that the room is a bit small and cramped. The drying rack is also relatively small and can only be placed in the room in winter, so it takes up more space.
    2. Facilities. The entertainment facilities in the north wing are relatively concentrated, with hot springs, swimming pools, gymnasiums, ice skating rinks, and breakfast restaurants in the north wing, and children's playgrounds in the south wing. Generally speaking, it is more convenient to live in the North Wing. The hot spring is halfway up the mountain, with a slightly larger pool and several separate small pools, each of which has water bathing facilities. The swimming pool has 2 entertainment pools with high temperature (the temperature is not the same, like a hot spring) and a non-standard swimming pool. Gymnasium facilities are professional, reservations are required, and there are fewer people after 3 o'clock in the afternoon.
    3. Services. Contact the customer service manager in advance to confirm the needs and provide one-to-one service. There are really a lot of people in the hotel, and the procedures are all very neat, but you have to basically get the room after 3 o'clock. The staff of various entertainment facilities are very attentive and enthusiastic, of course, except for the uncle in the gym who is louder, but he is also kind. After reading a lot of reviews, there are free car washes in the underground parking lot. After arriving, I found that the people who can park in the underground parking lot are all lucky. Most cars can only be crowded on the ground, driveways and other locations.
    4. Dining. Breakfast is in the cafe. After 9 o'clock, there are really many people. The people who guide are still very professional, and the overall queue time is not too long. There is actually salmon sashimi for breakfast, which is indeed arrogant. Lunch and dinner can be solved in cafes and Chinese restaurants. The cafe has some light meals. I tried beef noodles (the beef is really big), curry beef brisket set (good taste, big beef), pasta, Big Mac Burgers (to be honest, the photos look good and the taste is average). There are so many people in the Chinese restaurant that you have to queue up if you go late. I tried fish head puff pastry, spicy chicken, etc. The taste is okay, but the price is too beautiful.
    This trip was arranged for 3 nights in the middle of the mountain. In the middle, I went to the Nanshan Ski Resort (which is great), and then climbed the mountain, hot springs, children's playground, badminton, basketball, skating, swimming, and every day was very fulfilling. Sometimes children still feel unfulfilled.
     Finally, a little suggestion, arrange a small supermarket. In the evening, it is extremely inconvenient to buy milk, beer, and small snacks.

From the moment I entered the door, the service staff were very polite and guided me to park underground, check in at the hotel, and the waiter helped me with my luggage to the room. Because the housekeeper Han Yu contacted me the day before and learned about the people and needs of the occupants, so when I got to the room, I found that the details of the previous communication were done. The children's supplies, pedals, and toilet seat were already in the room. This is still Some surprises. Wang Jinrong, the waiter corresponding to the room, was also very considerate. Knowing that we had children, he prepared extra mineral water and left a message.
Because of the current epidemic, you need to make an appoin**ent to go to public places. You can make an appoin**ent yourself, or you can contact the housekeeper to help you make an appoin**ent at any time.
The hotel's main hot spring is very special. Because of the middle of the week, we go to the hot spring in the afternoon and evening. Although it is public, it is basically possible for a family to do one soup. The soup pools have different themes and different water temperatures. However, if the child is too young, it is still more suitable for the temperature of the pool water. The pool is also big and the water is relatively clean. There was also an episode when I was swimming. A staff member called me and cleaned the exterior of the car for free. I would also like to thank Ren Liangliang and Liu Wu Chou.
Dinner at the hotel at night, the price is relatively high, but the taste is okay, and the amount of key dishes is really big! After dinner, I took the children to the children's playground. The temperature was a bit low. The adults provided hotel slippers. The room was absolutely big! Some are suitable for 5-12 year olds, and some are younger. The children are very happy. Before leaving, the waiter Hai Jiao also gave the child a button sticker, saying that if the child is young, we may not take her to the event. So give a small gift. Also told us that we can continue to play here after we check out.
Breakfast is eaten in a western restaurant. There are many kinds. There are all kinds of Chinese and western-style cold cuts and fruits. The taste is not evaluated, but there are always some, and it feels like a sincere self-service.
The experience of these two days and one night is very good. The hardware and software of the hotel have passed the test. Although the service staff is indeed too enthusiastic, maybe it is mainly to give a good review, but the service is in place, and we can all understand it. After all, it is the end of the year, and everyone not easy
The only downside of the hotel may be the corridors. The public areas in the lobby are too cold, which is not friendly to children. After all, we go in and out of the hot springs to swim, and we are more worried that the children will catch a cold, although the rooms provide cotton vests. But it is better to raise the overall room temperature, after all, is it a parent-child hotel?
All in all, I will come again with my family in the future, highly recommended!

Two days have passed since the incident happened. The child cannot open his mouth to eat and can only eat soft liquid food. He has repeatedly communicated with the hotel. The police retrieved the surveillance video from the time. From the video, the child came ashore from the swimming pool and did not run, jump, push, or walk normally. I made my simple demands: 1. The hotel replied to me yesterday that they would give me a free room for three days without compensating for medical expenses. As a regular customer of the hotel, I feel chilled by the hotel's unprofessional and irresponsible attitude. Last night, Ctrip VIP customer service called to inquire about this matter. Thank you Ctrip.com for your concern. I also ask you to objectively judge this matter based on professional hotel emergency response plan data. As a customer, whether my request is excessive. After thinking over and over again, I posted the picture online, just to remind future guests that as a hotel that focuses on family vacations, parents must not have the same situation as us when taking their children to stay. After you arrive, there are ground parking spaces and underground garages. From the ba*****t, you can take the elevator directly to the lobby. All parking is free of charge.

Room: Although there is no photo, but like the official photos, it can be seen that the hotel is very new, with all smart home appliances controlled by ipad, and the decoration style and layout are also very high-end. It is no problem for two people to sleep.

Hot springs: The hot springs are really cool! It is recommended to change clothes in the room. The room is thoughtfully prepared with a down jacket and put it outside the bathrobe. Go outside and take the elevator directly to the hot spring in the middle of the mountain. I did not count carefully. There are many pools, and each pool has a separate bathroom. When we went there were few people, basically we were in the pool. It was very refreshing to watch the sunset glow in the hot springs on the mountain. The mountain also provides free hot drinks intimately, these details are really amazing.

The next morning we went to climb the mountain behind the hotel. The mountain was not big and the road was well repaired. As the best choice for morning exercise, it was not too tired and just reached the standard of exercise.

Finally, I would like to praise Liu Guochun and Feng Xiangguo of the Ministry of Safety Affairs in real names for washing our car for free during our parking period! Real-name praise! !

name:h‚Äço‚Äçr‚Äçg‚Äça

posted:Posted October 10, 2021
msg:I decided to come to the hot springs during the last few days of the November holiday. I heard that the experience here is good but the price is expensive. We staggered the holidays a little bit. The price dropped a little and there were not many people. I felt it was very worthwhile. happy.

üöó Transportation: It is very convenient to come from Shunyi over an hour, there is no traffic jam, there is an underground parking lot on the ground, and it is close to the fish street.

üçÉEnvironment: The environment in the middle of the mountain is good, with fresh air and wild flowers everywhere. There is a hiking trail behind, take 2 children down the whole journey for an hour and a half, which is slightly challenging, the highest point is more than 200 meters above sea level. What's interesting is that the sites are named after the planets, so that children are interested in walking.

Hot springs: Several hot spring pools are in the middle of the mountain. You can go up directly from the swimming pool by elevator. The elderly can take a bath in the following pools if it is inconvenient to climb the steps. Except for a large pool that is closed with glass, the others are half open. The temperature of the pools is not too good. Similarly, it is recommended that the temperature of the green tea pool is not so high, and the temperature of the top milk pool is also suitable. The water is white, and the pool cannot be maintained every day. It is better when there are not many people. It is basically a private bath to find a pool with no one. If there are too many people, I might choose a room with private bath. But the advantage of the public hot spring is that the scenery is very good. I saw the sunset in the hot spring pool on the first day and it was beautiful.

Meals: The hotel has a western restaurant and a Chinese restaurant. Breakfast is very rich in the western restaurant. Dandan noodles are my favorite. Children like chicken soup and wontons, and waffles are crispy. The prices of the two restaurants are not low, but the taste is okay. The Hainanese chicken rice in the western restaurant is amazing, and the bread in the burger is very fragrant.

Activity: The hotel has a large children's playground. I started to worry about what to do if only one child is free and two children are free when booking a room. In fact, it doesn't matter. You can enter the room. However, my child went there once when he was older. You can play table tennis, badminton, and basketball in the air film gymnasium. You need to make an appoin**ent in advance. We bring badminton (because you have done homework haha) otherwise it will cost money, and other rackets are free. I am addicted to sports every day. The master Guo Jianli of the gymnasium Especially good, take the initiative to bring us towels and mineral water, also very talkative. In addition, there are parent-child activities to participate in every day. We participated in a small kitchen to make doughnuts (material fees are required), hand-painted fans, pottery experience (fees apply), especially the handwork and pottery where Mr. He and Mr. Li It‚Äôs very good for children. Both children of pottery art made it according to the money received by one child. Before leaving, Teacher He remembered that the child liked a building block when we came to do the handicraft the day before. There are small pictures and text drawn by the teacher, which is very touched.

üîîService: Good service should be the highlight here. There are welcome fruits in the room, food in the refrigerator is free, and 5100 mineral water is available at any time in unlimited quantities. Sally in the front office is the butler who is in charge of receiving us. At the beginning, I added WeChat. After that, I can answer the questions promptly and enthusiastically. Every day I book the hot spring gym playground and so on, I will tell her directly, no need to scan the code to make an appoin**ent. , But those few days were really enough to trouble her, thank you very much. I left a few things in a hurry when I checked out. Fortunately, the front desk called in time to inform us that we went back to pick them up again. Thank you very much.

The only thing we suggest is that the balcony of the twin room is small and the wall is too high. You can't see anything on the chair. It would be better if it should be made of glass railings. All in all, this holiday experience is very good and will come again in the future.
