name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Premier Room
info:Stayed in October 2021
info:Family
info:4 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted October 13, 2021
msg:The first hotel I stayed in outside Beijing after the epidemic was better than the hotels near a certain lake in Hangzhou and Guilin before the epidemic. The scenery was refreshing and the service was warm and appropriate. I accompanied my 80-year-old mother on her birthday. The service housekeeper Hongmei called one day in advance to communicate and arrange. After arriving at the hotel, other staff also had a sense of ownership of the hotel. They were enthusiastic and not overstepping their boundaries. As a patient with deep social phobia, I had convenient services and did not have to bite the bullet to socialize during my vacation. There were Zhou Fang and Avon who waited silently, and Jinlai who used environmentally friendly items to decorate the room in advance, which was warm and atmospheric. There is an essential oil SPA at the health center every day in the private bath room on the first floor balcony. Sister Li Tao's Swiss oil massage technique and atmosphere are so comfortable. I also booked a facial treatment for the next day at my own expense. YOYO combined Thai stretching and facial treatment in one go. I took a nap directly in the aroma of the nice floral essential oil and music.
My mother and I don't really like hot springs, but the private hot spring on the balcony is available anytime, anywhere. The room attendant disinfected and rinsed it several times for me the first time, washing away the dust that had been blown in by the strong wind the night before. It was very convenient to go back to the bathroom and change clothes after the bath. I went to visit the Banshan Hot Spring on the last day. I didn't expect the scenery to be so beautiful. After the glass sightseeing elevator, there were open-air wooden paths and gentle stairs. Thick and long cotton vests and plenty of bath towels were neatly hung on the roadside. There were 15 roofs, one side was open-air and breathable, and half of the floor-to-ceiling glass was embedded in it, facing the green mountains. The green was overwhelming, and the sun shone directly on the two single sofas in the innermost part. Because it was a weekday morning after the National Day, there was no one else at first. I sat there listening to the gurgling sound of the spring water and basking in the sun. It was not a holiday or a weekend, and I came here on a weekday. This is a place where the air and mountain scenery are good and I am alone. Ha~ This is not a sulfur hot spring, and there is no pungent smell. When climbing the mountain, I saw several pipes led down from the cliff. It felt like the hot Miyun Mountain Spring water. The hot springs were soaked in Chinese herbal medicine bags with different therapeutic effects. I went to see all the hot springs on the sunny side. The water was green and yellow, and the medicine bags were still effective.
We spent the whole morning slowly climbing a 220-meter-high hill with an artificial fountain behind the house. After the wooden plank road, there are mountain stone slabs, red brick roads, and Shashuo trails. Cosmos and wild chrysanthemums are blooming on both sides. It is really walking on the "flower road". There is a small signpost along the way, and there is a small place to rest. The wild flowers and green leaves are full of vitality, and the wooden fences and stone benches maintained by humans are always considerate. After walking, I can't help but want to recite poems, "The flower path has never been swept for guests, and the door is now open for you." My mother, who studied science and engineering, sighed sincerely several times. The management here is particularly meticulous. I think the decision makers and designers have a very good aesthetic: the appearance of the building, the garden and the sign have the flavor of the Han Dynasty. The night lights of the balcony private soup are all warm and low-key yellow lights, not red, orange, yellow, green, blue, and purple glare. Through the gaps of the parasols, you can see that the stars in the dense clouds are particularly numerous and bright.
Finally, the dishes in the Chinese restaurant that must be mentioned are really amazing and outstanding! The portion is very large. My mother and I are from the south and can't eat too much. Sometimes we have to order one dish. The Geleshan spicy chicken is crispy and tasty. The prawn spring rolls, husband and wife lung slices, and white fungus and snow pear are better than the Sichuan restaurants in the city. If there are more people, we will try other dishes. I didn't have time to eat alone in the Western restaurant. The breakfast buffet in the Western restaurant is very rich, with both Western and Chinese varieties. The fruits are especially good. The grapefruit and honeydew melon are large and juicy. The old people eat freshly cooked wontons and dandan noodles.
I wrote a long comment specifically to thank the hotel for its service and appreciate the aesthetics of Chinese Han style. I will remember to come again in the future. Haha, I will also give "tap water" to friends and colleagues. By the way, the mineral water I drink is bottled locally in Tibet more than 5,000 meters~

Room: We booked a 1.3-meter twin room. The housekeeper arranged the bed in advance. The two children did not worry about falling. The room facilities are very new. We ate pizza and salad for dinner at the hotel. Compared to the restaurants in the city, we have to wait Improve, the dessert quality is very good. The number of breakfasts is not much but the variety is relatively complete, but the restaurant is not very large, and there are fewer tourists when we go out of the way.
Hot spring: The public hot spring pool has 12 small pools and one large pool. Each small hot spring pool is independent, with tables, chairs and toilets. Due to the inconvenience of bringing a baby, we did not switch to the hot spring pool and did not go to the large pool when there were not many people. Basically, the family can enjoy a small soup pool alone. On the first evening, there happened to be no one at the highest point. We watched a perfect sunset.
Entertainment: I didn‚Äôt go to experience the fitness center but it‚Äôs pretty good to see other people‚Äôs comments. It‚Äôs worth mentioning that the children‚Äôs playground is super large, with three levels of climbing slides, trampolines, and another space with two levels of high climbing frames and large ocean balls. , Because there are very few people on the wrong peak, the kids play high
It is said that there will be discounts on Double Eleven, hot spring hotels worth visiting, although the price is higher, but it includes hot springs with excellent views of the scenery, large children's playground, good service, unique location, and very cost-effective!

msg:During the Mid-Autumn Festival holiday, the old man and old lady from the family came to the Gulf Mid-Levels Hot Spring Hotel. Eva Li Xin from the room depar**ent was our housekeeper. He provided warm, thoughtful and moderate service throughout the whole journey. Before traveling around domestic and foreign hotels, homestays, apar**ents, etc. I have lived a lot, and I feel that the general four or five stars are just like that. The regular service does not feel anything special, but Mid-Levels Bay does a good job.1. Early check-in: With the elderly, they want to be able to stay in the hotel at any time. The elderly can take a rest, adapt to the environment, and then start other activities. Originally, the Mid-Autumn Festival, plus two rooms with private soup and twin beds were reserved. Did not expect to check in early, after Eva's coordination, when we arrived at the hotel at 11:30, both rooms were ready, and I felt very good;2. The hotel‚Äôs environmental decoration and design details are very exquisite. The elevator button position is different from other hotels. The golden leaf on the top of the hotel lobby plus the golden branches and fine porcelain decorative lights are more magnificent. The linen in the room is very textured. All facilities: lighting, temperature, and TV can all be controlled by a tablet computer, which is more convenient for the times brought by the Internet of Things;3. Mini bar: all free, and I feel that the hotel is more a**ospheric. Unlike most hotels, when you leave the store, check the room and check the consumption. Sometimes I really prefer not to use it, and I don‚Äôt want to accept the "Do you have room consumption?" Inquiries; the free glacial mineral water in the room is also very good;4. Private bathing pool: This is probably the fastest water injection in many hot spring hotels I've been to. It fills a whole pool in about 20 or 30 minutes. It is not like an old hot spring hotel, which restricts water consumption during the stay. The details make people feel comfortable; the private soup is also equipped with a huge liftable parasol to avoid leaves and rain, but also to prevent embarrassment when looking down on the balcony upstairs. The attached medicated bath bag is very popular for the elderly;5. Mid-level hot spring bathing pool: I had lunch and went to Mid-level hot spring bathing pool at 2 o'clock. The scenery was really good. There are 13 semi-open bathing pools. Except for the first hot spring bathing pool, the rest are all medicines. Bath, like the Twelve Water Method of the Old Summer Palace, each room has a different zodiac stone water outlet. Of course, the bathing pool is also very popular. It is basically a bathing pool for a family. We went to the Ganoderma lucidum bathing pool with rooster stone carvings. The water temperature 36-40 degrees, you don‚Äôt need to adapt, you can soak directly in, watching the scenery of the mid-levels, and there is drizzle in the air. Generally, it is really pleasant to enjoy the comfortable medicated bathing springs; every pool side There is a free water bar not far away that provides ginger tea and sour plum soup. Old people feel thirsty after soaking for a while. After a cup of ice-cold sour plum soup, they will feel cool and comfortable;6. Physiotherapy center: Physiotherapy is included with the reservation. Eva kindly helped us book the Himalayan salt bath and the Bianstone room one day in advance. We started the experience on time at 3 o'clock. The physiotherapy center was guided by service staff throughout the whole process and assigned to The experience is very comfortable in a room with few people. The salt steam room is not too hot. The old lady has high blood pressure and stayed for 20 minutes. She feels bored. The stone bed is a bit hot, but it feels like I have been sitting for a long time. I feel discomfort in the cervical spine. I lie on it and bake it hot for a while, but I also feel that the soreness is greatly relieved;7. Space Stadium: The appearance is a unique capsule design. After the physical therapy, play table tennis and badminton for a while and make full use of the time before dinner. Of course, this is also arranged by Angel Eva in advance;8. Park: Because the weather has been raining during the stay, the hiking trail failed to be realized after dinner originally planned, but the park is also big enough, and the elderly feel good for a walk and digestion;9. Evening: Generally, the pillows in hotels are hard or soft. Old people always feel uncomfortable. Usually, they use bath towels to stack a small pillow to save the uncomfortable. However, Mid-Levels Hotel provides four different sizes, soft and hard pillows, and there is always one that suits you. , There is a spare quilt in the closet, you can choose, it is a detail, otherwise it is troublesome to always call room service;10. Breakfast: objective evaluation, there are a lot of people, I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs the reason for the holiday season, there are a lot of people eating in the morning, the table is densely arranged, and it‚Äôs inconvenient to sit up; there are still many types in the morning, what can be mentioned is that there are salmon in Japanese food , Miso soup; Chinese food has tofu nao, fried dough sticks, pancakes, Dandan noodles (I am looking forward to it, but I did not eat fried liver) Western food has croissants, etc. Others are regular milk, juice, coffee, wonton, porridge, Tea, eggs, fried rice, noodles, etc. One of the uncomfortable places is the seat and the other is the dinner bowl. Whether it is a porridge bowl, a soup bowl, or a bowl of tofu nao, they are all very small and not very convenient to use. It's about the amount of one tablespoon;11. Other:1) The details of the hotel are very well done, especially the uninterrupted disinfectant and masks in the lobby during the epidemic, and guests are reminded to wear masks from time to time;2) In the evening, Eva had already left work and arranged milk and yogurt for the elderly, which was very considerate;3) Before the return trip, Eva also arranged for Zhou Fang and Feifei to bid farewell to the room, pay a return visit, and presented two sets of L‚ÄôOccitane bathing suits, TWG tea bags and mineral water to drink on the road. Although it is not a big thing, it is It feels very thoughtful;The above is the current account during my stay with my family and it is also a real experience. The average hotel, no matter how high-end, including Banyan Tree, Angsana, Aman or Club Med, etc., must be very good, but staying I have stayed after I have passed it. I basically don‚Äôt want to go again, but I hope to experience a new hotel next time. However, the Bay Banshan Hot Spring Hotel is really the only hotel I am looking forward to visiting again, so far. The hardware has nothing to say, the service is very in place, and when it is in place, it is moderate. It will not make people feel alienated because of indifference, and it will not make people uncomfortable because of being cold. All in all, it is very good. Finally, I would like to thank Eva, Zhou Fang and Feifei of the Housing Management Depar**ent again, and look forward to meeting again.

msg:Can't go out of Beijing because of the epidemic. Is the summer vacation when the baby said that he can't travel is called summer vacation? So I came for a walk-and-go trip, coordinated to the Miyun Bay Banshan Hot Spring Hotel.
The first thing to praise is service. The day before departure, Miss Li Xinxin and Eva from the hotel contacted by phone. Because there were so many people during the summer vacation, she asked us our estimated time of arrival, so as not to be unable to check in in time. On the day of check-in, we started to keep in touch with us from around one o'clock, and cared about where we were all the way. When we arrived, we coordinated our room check-in and helped us make an appoin**ent to go to the pool. The next morning, we also reminded us of breakfast time. Although we did not meet, we communicated throughout the whole process and were very careful. Secondly, two hours before check-out, the two sisters Zhou Fang and Peng Yuqin from the housekeeping depar**ent thoughtfully sent a few more bottles of water to drink on the road, and also sent a sample of L‚ÄôOccitane's bath, which was not seen in other hotels. It may be these details that impress customers at that time!
Then talk about the hotel's hardware. The location of the hotel is actually very close to the city of Miyun, and it is almost an hour away from Beijing city without traffic jams. It is called Banshan Hot Spring Hotel. It is really located in the middle of the mountain. The hotel is built on the mountain. The huts in Tangquan are all on the mountain. The hotel also has a plank road leading to the mountain. For children, having a swimming pool is enough! There is a swimming pool and a hot spring pool in Banshan Hot Spring. The swimming pool is a standard swimming pool, two small hot spring pools for children to play; Tangquan Pavilion has a dozen pools of different flavors, each pool is in a cabin, relatively private, when there are not many people, the family is in the same cabin It's still very good.
The food and accommodation is quite satisfactory. The hotel has a western restaurant and a Chinese restaurant. The western restaurant only has breakfast and buffet, and lunch and dinner are all a la carte. The Chinese restaurant is rather amazing, tastes good, and the price is relatively reasonable. Before reading the reviews, we brought some food for ourselves. Every day we have a breakfast buffet, a light meal in the middle, and a decent meal in the restaurant in the evening.

The Miyun Fish Street is 3 kilometers away, which is very convenient.
Hygiene: clean
Entertainment activities: swimming pools, children's playgrounds, gymnasiums, hot springs, and hotel features-hiking trails (approximately 5 kilometers, 1 hour), are generally very rich. All ages. Hot springs and gymnasiums need to be reserved in advance.

It's easier.
üõè Room: Choose a deluxe twin room, room is about 40„é°, there is a balcony to enjoy the mountain view, the mattress is soft and hard, and provides three different sizes of soft and hard pillows, the head of the bed has smart PAD to adjust the lighting, air conditioning and other room facilities. ‚ô®Ô∏è Hot Spring: Since the hot spring is the main selling point, you have to experience the various soup pools. The hot spring area is located in the middle of the north side of the hotel. There are about a dozen different health-care pools, each spaced more than ten meters, set up in a wrong way, so that you can easily change different experiences. Each soup pool is a semi-closed wooden house style, personal feeling is much cleaner than the pure open-air soup pool, there are sofas and television, there is a separate bathroom, while enjoying the night mountain view while enjoying the soup, while still feeling the coolness brought by the wind from the semi-closed glass windows, I'm so happy!
‚õπüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Activity Project: 1 Ô∏è‚É£ There are basketball, badminton and table tennis in the gym. The standard of the stadium is regular and the layout is reasonable. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Children's Paradise is in the South Building. It seems to be a small area from the entrance. After entering, there are other holes. The slide, the ocean ball pool, the small expansion project have everything. A water soft package, the safety factor is trustworthy. Personally, children over the age of six can feel free to leave, and parents of young children are equipped with car seats.
3Ô∏è‚É£The second floor of the North Building is an indoor pool, with a six-distance pool of 25 meters deep 1.5 meters and two children's warm water pools, fully catering to the different needs of the guests. The water depth of the pool is about 0.6 meters, there is a spray massage, the children are not happy,
4Ô∏è‚É£ Through the hotel lobby to the east side of the hotel, you can experience the mountain climbing and distant view. There are two lines up the mountain. With each human strength, each climb has a rest point named after the solar system planet. You can stop and take pictures of the mountain view. The mountain is covered with vegetation and oxygen, and the top of the mountain provides a panoramic view of the hotel. Near the top of the mountain there are light signs with the hotel's English name, and at night you can see the feeling of being in Hollywood Beverly Hills.
üôÜüèª General Review: The hotel is well-deserved as the first place for North China's parent-child summer vacation. The hardware facilities are well equipped and the service is impeccable. Parent-child, couples, and filial piety are suitable for the elderly! Á¨¨‰∫åÔºåË™¨Ë™¨ÈÖíÂ∫óÁöÑÈ†êÁ¥ÑÂà∂„ÄÇÈÖíÂ∫óÈ†ÖÁõÆ‰∏çÂ∞ëÔºåÂ∞èÁ´•ÊâãÂ∑•ÔºåÊ∏©Ê≥âÔºåÂ∫∑È´îÂÅ•Ë∫´ÔºåÈ§äÁîüÊúÉÊâÄÔºåÊÉ≥ÂèÉÂä†ÈÄô‰∫õÈ†ÖÁõÆÂâçÊèêÊòØÊÇ®ÂæóÈ†êÁ¥ÑÔºåÈÖíÂ∫óÂàùË°∑ÊòØÂ•ΩÁöÑÔºåÊÉ≥ËÆìÈ´îÈ©óÁöÑË≥ìÂÆ¢ÊúâÂÄãÂ•ΩÁöÑÊÑüÂèóÔºåÂèØÊòØÈÅ∏ÈÄôÂÄãÈÖíÂ∫óÁöÑÁõÆÁöÑÂ∞±ÊòØÊÉ≥Â•ΩÂ•ΩÊîæÈ¨ÜÊîæÈ¨ÜÔºåÊ∏°ÂÄãÂÅáÔºåÁµêÊûúÊâÄÊúâÈ†ÖÁõÆÂæóÊèêÂâçÁ¥ÑÔºåÁ¥Ñ‰∏ä‰∫ÜÂ∞±ÂæóÁúãÁùÄÊôÇÈñìÂéªÈ´îÈ©óÔºåÁ¥ÑÂÆå‰∫ÜÂ∞±Ë°πËÉΩÂú®ÊàøÈñìÁúãÈõªË¶ñÔºåÂÜçÂä†‰∏äÂæàÂ§ö‰∏çÁ¢∫ÂÆöÂõ†Á¥†ÊØîÂ¶ÇÂêÉÈ£ØÁ≠â‰ΩçÔºåÊú¨‰æÜË®àÂäÉÂ•ΩÁöÑÂèà‰∏çÂæó‰∏çËá®ÊôÇÊîπËÆäÔºåÂÖ©Â§©‰∏ÄÊôöÊï¥ÁöÑÂøôÂøôÁ¢åÁ¢åÁ∑äÂºµÂÖÆÂÖÆÔºå‰∏ÄÈªûÊ≤íÊîæÈ¨Ü„ÄÇ
Á¨¨‰∏âÔºåÊàëÂÄëÈ†êÁ¥ÑÈ´îÈ©ó‰∫ÜÁæΩÊØõÁêÉ‰∏ÄÂ∞èÊôÇÔºåÊú¨‰æÜÈ§ìÁùÄËÇöÂ≠êÊâìÁêÉÂ∞±ÊÜãÁùÄÁÅ´ÔºåÈÄ≤ÂéªÂæåÊúçÂãôÂì°Ë™¨ÁêÉÊãçÂÖçË≤ªÊèê‰æõÔºåÁæΩÊØõÁêÉÂçÅ‰∫îÂÖÉ‰∏ÄÂÄãÔºåËÅΩÂÆåÊúâ‰∫õÁÑ°Ë™ûÔºå‰∏âÂçÉÂ§öÁöÑ‰ΩèÂÆøÈå¢ÈÉΩËä±‰∫Ü‰∏çÂ∑ÆÈÄôÂçÅ‰∫îÂÖÉÔºå‰ΩÜÂõ†ÁÇ∫ÂâçÊúüÈ†êÁ¥ÑÁöÑÊôÇÂÄôË°πÁúãË¶ãÊèêÁ§∫ÂÖçË≤ªÈ´îÈ©ó‰∏ÄÂ∞èÊôÇÔºåÊ≤íÊúâ‰ªª‰ΩïÂú∞ÊñπÊèêÁ§∫ÁæΩÊØõÁêÉÈúÄË¶ÅËá™ÂÇôÔºåÊàñËÄÖÁæΩÊØõÁêÉÂñÆÁç®Ë≥ºË≤∑ÂøÉË£è‰∏çËàíÊúçÔºåÊàëÂêëÂ∑•‰Ωú‰∫∫Âì°ÊèêÂá∫Âª∫Ë≠∞ÊáâË©≤È†êÁ¥ÑÊôÇÊúâÂÄãÂëäÁü•ÔºåÁµêÊûúÂ∑•‰Ωú‰∫∫Âì°Ë™¨ÊàëÂÄëÂ∏∏Âπ¥ÈÉΩÈÄôÊ®£ÔºåÈÇ£Â•ΩÂêßÔºåÁÆóÊàëÂ≠§ÈôãÂØ°ËÅûÔºåÁúã‰æÜÈÖíÂ∫óÈÇÑÊòØÂ∏åÊúõÊé•ÂæÖËÄÅÈ°ßÂÆ¢„ÄÇÊñ∞È°ßÂÆ¢‰æÜÁöÑÊôÇÂÄôË®òÂæóÂ∏∂ÁæΩÊØõÁêÉ„ÄÇ
